attributes.review:
hello mr. orange body 😩💦🍊,

your app 🚫🚫🚫🔞 was no bueno 🏳️ for me.. personally👩🏻 there was not🙅🏻‍♀️enough 🤫personal🥵 interaction between the ✨two ✨of us... 💔🔓🔑 i seen your 🥴‼️SCRUMPTIOUS‼️🥺, juicy🍑🍌🍐🍆💦 BOD online and did not get to 👀witness more 😞😞😞if you’re gonna have an app— 👁👄👁use it correctly 🗣🗣 goodnight mr. orange body 🧡💔🧡💔🔓📝
attributes.title: dear daddy...

attributes.review: Let’s be honest- this app actually changed my life. Once opened, my screen was filled with rainbows 🌈 and joy! It lightened my heart to know that there are still some people in this great country 🇱🇷 who share my Christian values 🙏🏻🙏🏻 of love and acceptance! All are welcome here, because Our President is the MOST accepting and tolerant leader we have ever had! Are you black? Have no fear! LBGTQI? Come on over!!!! An immigrant? I this app welcomes you to stay a while 💓 JUST KIDDING I mean really, if you want to vote for the most hate filled l, bigoted, racist, unintelligent, boring and Loser president- Donny is your man.
attributes.title: CHANGED MY LIFE

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because all the good reviews said that snowflakes have been leaving fake reviews, and I BELIEVED THEM, but then when I downloaded it it started searching through all my information and DELETING it!! I’m a loyal, republican trump supporter, but I honestly don’t know what to believe anymore!! I think Trump might be paying for these good reviews, I wish I had listened to all these reviews saying not to download the app. I had to cancel all my credit cards and encrypt the files backed up on my computer. All I can do now is hope that my identity doesn’t get stolen.
attributes.title: Just terrible!!

attributes.review: My name is Ben Dover 🧑🏽‍🦱 I’m from Maryland 🚁 and I was trying to help out ✨Trumpy✨ and everything 💁‍♂️and the app took my social security #️⃣number💳 very outrageous🤬 my wife Karen Dover 👩‍🦳WANTS TO SPEAK TO THE CEO AND MANAGER 🙈
attributes.title: Social security stolen!!

attributes.review: It won’t let me open the app :/
attributes.title: Don’t get it

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to keep up with our 💖✨lovely ✨💖presidents campaign. I was VERY MUCH excited to have this wonderful app in my phone. Instead all I got was a virus!!!!! All of the technology in my house got hacked and sold to the Chinese government!!! I am VERY disappointed in this app. It got so bad I had to throw away my refrigerator because every time I opened it it would go 𝔁𝓾𝓮🥶𝓱𝓾𝓪🧚‍♀️𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸😻𝓹𝓲𝓪𝓸🗿𝓫𝓮𝓲👺𝓯𝓮𝓷𝓰🤩𝔁𝓲𝓪𝓸😼𝔁𝓲𝓪𝓸👣. Even my microwave starting going 𝒻ℴ𝓇 𝒾𝓃 𝒽ℯ𝓇  💕 𝒻ℴ𝓇 𝒾𝓃 𝒽ℯ𝓇 💕𝒻ℴ𝓇 𝒾𝓃 𝒽ℯ𝓇 💕
3747839202/10 would NOT download again.
attributes.title: DISAPPOINTED

attributes.review: while we’re talking about waste, i’d like to say that this app is trash, it represents hate and white supremacy.
attributes.title: a waste of 52.1 MB

attributes.review: I was honestly so excited to download this app to be able to support the most amazing most smartest most beautiful president our country has ever had and immediately after I got it my phone glitched and a video of mike pence came up on my phone and he was laughing maniacally at me. I tried to turn off my phone but it got worse. My entire screen then turned completely orange it gave me two options to cancel and to continue. I aggressively pressed cancel but after a minute of that there was a loud knock on my front door, I opened the door and my block was filled with black suvs, two men in dark glasses were standing on my porch then flashed a bright light at my face and that’s the last thing I remembered before I woke up in an interrogation room in what I believed was mainland China they put a computer in front of my face with all my personal information, mike then walked in and forced me to type my social security number when I refused they all left and told me they would be coming back to torture me. Jumping up on the table I quickly found my way out through the air vents, there was a hoverboard on the roof and I escaped home on that, getting pooped on by birds and almost plummeting towards earth. After 13 hours I had arrived home where my home had been robbed a streak of Cheeto dust everywhere I looked. Do not download this app I am now homeless and the Chinese government is looking for me.
attributes.title: Trump I’m so disappointed

attributes.review: I downloaded this app it made my phone crash and I really wanted to”Help trump” but he messed up my phone so one star worst app and President
attributes.title: Yoo

attributes.review: I literally got two jobs to raise money for mr trumps campaign, but when I got the app it STOLE all my credit cards and told me that I was fat. 😥I am so upset that mr trump would do this, especially because I have been his number one fan, even after the radical left has been attacking him for helping us exceed over 3,000,000 deaths! Would Obama do that for us? I think not. I would never want to speak badly of the very handsome mr trump 🥰 but I think that there is a chance that the liberal media has ATTACKED mr trumps app. I know that mr trump would never do this to me, so I have no choice but to draw the conclusion that he has hired somebody on the liberal left to TANK his app. Because of these facts, I recommend the app be shut down FOREVER 💀in order to protect mr trump from the fake media.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE 😫😖😭✨
